data.actual_result: It only highlights and doesn't move the menu down with it
data.expected_result: The menu should go highlight and scroll down the list
data.short_description: Channel permissions context menu doesn't go with arrow keys
data.steps_to_repro: - Have "Manage Channels" permission or higher - Make a lot of roles - Right click a channel or category - Click "Edit Channel" or "Edit Category" - Click "Permissions" - Click "Roles/Members +" - Move your arrow keys down or up
